items.sentence: Tom said that he isn't very likely to do that.
Tom said he didn't believe that Mary did that.
Tom said that doing that might be a good idea.
Tom said that doing that might cause problems.
Tom said that doing that would be a good idea.
Tom said that doing that wouldn't be much fun.
It would've been better if I hadn't done that.
I didn't use to like to do that, but I do now.
Tom says that he wants you to stop doing that.
It isn't necessary for you to do that anymore.
